ai-tha-ap451:2.2_0: what you’ve done or left undone,
ai-tha-ap451:2.3_0: In the sky above the sky,
ai-tha-ap451:2.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap451:3.3_0: I don’t see fear and dread
ai-tha-ap451:3.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap451:4.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap451:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap451:5.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
ai-tha-ap451:6.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap451:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap451:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vaggumudā.
ai-tha-ap451:10.1_0: The senior monk who was a junior, a ninth for the senior.
